Noted, you have a degree in. Based on this, I can help recommend a suitable course for you. Would you like to proceed?
Thank you for sharing. Your research experience can be valuable for our courses. Let me help you find the best fit.
That's impressive. Research could complement our programs. Let's find the right one for you.
Got it. So, you're an international student. Let me provide information tailored to international students.
Noted. You're coming from. Would you need information for international students?
Understood. I'll provide information tailored to national students.
You can apply on our Admissions Page.

Take care. Feel free to return if you have more queries. All the best!
Bye. Reach out if you have more queries. Best wishes!
Tuition fees for the 2023-2024 Academic Year are: Domestic undergraduates: £9,250 per year. International undergraduates: £20,000 per year. Note: Postgraduate course fees differ.

Yes, Prestigia University provides scholarships based on academic achievement and financial need. There are also scholarships specifically for international students. Would you like details on eligibility and application?
